name: A Game About Something Something
description:
Silence envelopes the room. The rain drums down on the window. Your phone goes off.

This game is a short, artsy experience with a very abstract story. To be honest it probably doesn't make much sense. It only lasts about 10 minutes, unless you search for secrets, so it's free to download! However, I would totally appreciate any money thrown my way kk.

Controls
  • Keyboard/Mouse/Gamepad to control character.
  • Hold Esc/Start on gamepad to close while in fullscreen
  • -/+ to change game volume

Credits
  • A game created by George Baron (@PixelbearGames)
  • Credits music and piano crash by Robert Conquer (@robconquer)
  • Images provided by artists at FreeImages.com
  • Sound Effects provided by artists at FreeSound.org
  • Individual links to images and sound effects available in download
  • Created using Haxe, OpenFL and HaxeFlixel!
Specs

The premiumest of toasters.
